exchanges.name: SyncSwap
exchanges.description: SyncSwap brings more people easy-to-use and low-cost DeFi with complete Ethereum security powered by zero-knowledge technology.

exchanges.name: Maverick
exchanges.description: Maverick Protocol offers a new infrastructure for decentralized finance, built to facilitate the most liquid markets for traders, liquidity providers, DAO treasuries, and developers, powered by a revolutionary Automated Market Maker (AMM)

exchanges.name: Koi
exchanges.description: KOI is a DeFi platform, serving as a liquidity hub for all projects on zkSync. KOI's dynamic dApp features both a concentrated and standard pool AMM DEX, complete with limit orders, a farming platform, and a bond platform.

exchanges.name: Velocore
exchanges.description: Velocore offers users an environment where everyone can trade with low fees and slippage, while relieving protocols of the burden of inflating their respective token rewards, with the goal of growing the DeFi ecosystem together.

exchanges.name: Zyfi
exchanges.description: Zyfi is a DeFi portal to gasless transactions on zkSync, allowing users to pay with any ERC-20 token as gas or enjoy sponsored swaps. It is powered by Zyfi's paymaster API.

lend and Borrow.name: ZeroLend
lend and Borrow.description: The most efficient lending market for liquid restaking tokens (LRTs). Borrow Ethereum against $weETH, $pufETH, $ezETH and others.

deposit and Withdraw.name: LayerSwap
deposit and Withdraw.description: Deposit from any exchange to Clave or bridge your assets from / to another chain.

bridges.name: txSync,
bridges.description: Native bridge and user friendly interface to view and interact with your assets on zkSync and zkSync Lite.
